card.name: SimplyCLICK SBI Card
card.description: SimplyCLICK SBI Card offers unlimited privileges including Amazon.in gift card worth Rs.500 on payment of Annual Fee, accelerated reward points on online spends, milestone e-vouchers on annual online spends, fuel surcharge waiver, contactless technology, worldwide acceptance, add-on cards, cash withdrawal, utility bill payment facility, balance transfer on EMI and Flexipay.
card.target_audience: Individuals who shop online frequently and want accelerated rewards and shopping benefits.

categories.name: All other spends
categories.description: Earn 1 reward point per Rs.100 on all other spends.
categories.terms_and_conditions: Refer to detailed Terms and Conditions on SBI Card website.
categories.how_to_earn: Use SimplyCLICK SBI Card for transactions other than online spends with exclusive partners.
categories.exclusions: Cash Advance, Balance Transfer, Encash, Flexipay and Offline Fuel transactions are excluded.

categories.name: All other online spends
categories.description: Earn 5X Reward Points on all other online spends.
categories.terms_and_conditions: Capped at 10,000 Reward Points per calendar month. Post cap, 1 Reward Point per Rs.100 spent.
categories.how_to_earn: Use SimplyCLICK SBI Card for online spends excluding exclusive partners.
categories.exclusions: Utility Bill Payments on SBI Card website/mobile app do not accrue 5X points.

categories.name: Online spends with exclusive partners
categories.description: Earn 10X Reward Points on online spends with exclusive partners: Apollo 24x7, BookMyShow, Cleartrip, Dominos, IGP, Myntra, Netmeds, Yatra.
categories.terms_and_conditions: Applicable only when payment is done in INR. Dependent on merchant network acceptability and Merchant Identifiers provided by partners.
categories.how_to_earn: Use SimplyCLICK SBI Card for online spends with exclusive partners.
categories.exclusions: Transactions from affiliate channels for Cleartrip and Yatra are excluded.

bonus_rates.terms_and_conditions: Annual fee of Rs. 499 reversed for the SimplyCLICK SBI card in the subsequent year.

redemption.process: Voucher Code sent on registered mobile number within 21 days from payment of membership fee.
redemption.terms_and_conditions: Voucher valid for 12 months from date of adding to Amazon Pay. Cannot be redeemed in parts or for cash.
redemption.validity: 12 months from adding to Amazon Pay
redemption.processing_time: Within 21 days from payment of membership fee

redemption.process: E-Voucher details sent via SMS on registered mobile number within 30 days of reaching spend milestone.
redemption.terms_and_conditions: Voucher issued is final and cannot be substituted. Valid for Cleartrip or Yatra bookings as per respective terms.
redemption.validity: 4 months from date of sharing coupon code

benefits.name: Amazon.in Gift Card
benefits.description: Get Amazon.in gift card worth Rs.500 on payment of Annual Fee of Rs. 499 + taxes.
benefits.how_to_avail: Pay the annual membership fee of Rs. 499 + taxes.
benefits.terms_and_conditions: Account must be in good standing. Voucher valid for 12 months from adding to Amazon Pay.
benefits.validity: 12 months from adding to Amazon Pay
benefits.eligibility: Payment of annual membership fee and account in good standing.

benefits.name: Accelerated Reward Points
benefits.description: Earn 10X Reward Points on online spends with exclusive partners and 5X on other online spends.
benefits.how_to_avail: Use SimplyCLICK SBI Card for eligible online transactions.
benefits.terms_and_conditions: 10X applicable only on INR payments. Caps and exclusions apply.
benefits.usage_limit: Monthly cap of 10,000 points on 5X category

benefits.name: E-Vouchers on Annual Online Spends
benefits.description: E-Vouchers worth Rs. 2,000 each on reaching annual online spends of Rs. 1 Lakh and Rs. 2 Lakh respectively.
benefits.how_to_avail: Reach the specified annual online spend milestones.
benefits.terms_and_conditions: Voucher issued at discretion of SBI Card. Valid for Cleartrip or Yatra bookings only.
benefits.eligibility: SimplyCLICK SBI Cardholders reaching spend milestones

benefits.name: Fuel Surcharge Waiver
benefits.description: 1% fuel surcharge waiver for transactions between Rs 500 & Rs 3000, max Rs 100 per statement cycle.
benefits.how_to_avail: Use SimplyCLICK SBI Card for fuel transactions within specified limits.
benefits.value: 1% waiver up to Rs. 100 per statement cycle

benefits.name: Contactless Payments
benefits.description: Make fast and secure contactless payments by waving your card at a secured reader.
benefits.how_to_avail: Use card at contactless enabled POS terminals.
benefits.terms_and_conditions: Max payment of Rs. 5,000 per contactless transaction.

current_offers.title: Amazon.in Gift Card on Annual Fee Payment
current_offers.description: Get Amazon.in gift card worth Rs.500 on payment of Annual Fee of Rs. 499 + taxes.
current_offers.terms_and_conditions: Account must be in good standing. Voucher sent within 21 days.

current_offers.title: Milestone E-Vouchers
current_offers.description: E-Vouchers worth Rs. 2,000 each on reaching annual online spends of Rs. 1 Lakh and Rs. 2 Lakh.
current_offers.terms_and_conditions: Voucher issued at discretion of SBI Card. Valid for Cleartrip or Yatra bookings only.

perks.name: Add-on Cards
perks.description: Empower family members with add-on cards for parents, spouse, children or siblings above 18.
perks.how_to_use: Apply for add-on cards through SBI Card services.

perks.name: Worldwide Acceptance
perks.description: Use SimplyCLICK SBI Card at over 24 million outlets globally including 3,25,000 in India.
perks.how_to_use: Use card at any Visa or MasterCard accepting outlet.

perks.name: Cash on the Go
perks.description: Withdraw cash from over 1 million Visa or MasterCard ATMs worldwide.
perks.how_to_use: Use SimplyCLICK SBI Card at ATMs.

perks.name: Utility Bill Payment Facility
perks.description: Pay electricity, telephone, mobile and other utility bills using Easy Bill Pay facility.
perks.how_to_use: Use Easy Bill Pay on SBI Card platform.

perks.name: Balance Transfer on EMI
perks.description: Transfer outstanding balance of other banksâ€™ credit cards to SimplyCLICK SBI Card and pay back in EMIs at lower interest.
perks.how_to_use: Log on to sbicard.com with user ID and password to avail.

perks.name: Flexipay
perks.description: Convert transactions of Rs. 2,500 or more into easy monthly installments.
perks.how_to_use: Log in to sbicard.com within 30 days of purchase to convert.

partnerships.benefit: Amazon.in gift card worth Rs. 500 on annual fee payment
partnerships.validity: 12 months from adding to Amazon Pay
partnerships.how_to_avail: Pay annual membership fee and redeem voucher sent on registered mobile.
partnerships.terms_and_conditions: Voucher cannot be redeemed in parts or for cash.

partnerships.benefit: E-Vouchers worth Rs. 2,000 on reaching annual online spends
partnerships.how_to_avail: Enter coupon code at payment page on Cleartrip website or app.
partnerships.terms_and_conditions: Coupon valid for single transaction only, non-transferable, non-refundable.

partnerships.benefit: E-Vouchers worth Rs. 2,000 on reaching annual online spends
partnerships.how_to_avail: Enter e-Voucher code at checkout on Yatra website or app.
partnerships.terms_and_conditions: Voucher valid for flights, hotels, holidays bookings only. Non-refundable.

partnerships.partner: Apollo 24x7, BookMyShow, Dominos, IGP, Myntra, Netmeds
partnerships.how_to_avail: Use SimplyCLICK SBI Card for online spends on partner platforms.
partnerships.terms_and_conditions: 10X points applicable only on INR payments.

fees_and_charges.waiver_conditions: Annual fee reversed if annual spends for last year >= Rs. 1,00,000
fees_and_charges.terms_and_conditions: All taxes applicable as per government regulations.

fees_and_charges.waiver_conditions: Renewal Fee reversed if annual spends for last year >= Rs. 1,00,000
fees_and_charges.terms_and_conditions: All taxes applicable as per government regulations.
